generic_file.name: filename
generic_file.documentation: The original full file path and name (e.g '/Users/labName/Documents/YYMMDD/subjectName/fileName.jpg').

generic_file.name: formatOntology
generic_file.documentation: The ontology node describing the file format in the form of ontology:nodeID (e.g 'EMPTY:0000002').

generic_file.name: dateCreated
generic_file.documentation: The time that the file was created specified as a datenum.

generic_file.name: dateUpdated
generic_file.documentation: The time that the file was last updated specified as a datenum.

generic_file.name: checksum
generic_file.documentation: The MD5 checksum of the file.
